quest.name: Cloying Victory
journal: Jacke needs you to join his rogues in the effort to reclaim the Black Sarcophagus.

Jacke has decided that a net of rogues cast over the city is the only way to catch the Reformists before they can go through with their murderous plan. Take up your position at the Aftcastle, and stay vigilant for any signs of Aisibhir and his crew.

Slipping past the vigilant gazes of rogues and Yellowjackets alike, the Reformists manage to reach the Mizzenmast and prime the Black Sarcophagus to explode. With scant moments left until the mine is set to detonate, however, you manage to disable the device and save the city from untold destruction. Aisibhir and his crew are defeated, and the prototype weapon once again safe in the hands of the Yellowjackets.

As for Milala's challenge, Jacke's keen ears and nimble fingers have allowed the impudent guildmaster to liberate the Silver Sorrows from the ailing and unsuspecting captain. Thus do the rogues end the contest with two of the three treasures, ensuring victory for the guild. Return to the Dutiful Sisters and speak with Jacke.

Appearing glad to see the difficult and lengthy assignment come to an end, Jacke praises your unrelenting dedication to the code. Should you choose to leave the shadows of the underworld, however, he suggests that you devote yourself to a code of your own, and employ your deadly new skills to uphold it. Though your eyes may readjust to the light of day, the lessons learned at the Dutiful Sisters will never leave you.
objectives: Keep watch from your position at the Aftcastle.
Speak with Jacke at the Rogues' Guild.

dialogue.name: JACKE
dialogue.text: If the leader o' the Reformists─this “Captain Aisibhir”─is plannin' on millin' the Admiral with a bang, then my guess is he'll be aimin' to demolish the entire command room.

dialogue.name: JACKE
dialogue.text: Ye know the Mizzenmast, aye? The tower what holds the Drownin' Wench an' Bulwark Hall? The Admiral's Bridge─an' her command room─are right at the top of it.

dialogue.name: JACKE
dialogue.text: Then ye've got the district what surrounds the Mizzenmast─that's the busy beatin' heart o' the city. Even with the threat of an attack, ye can't just seal it up in the blink of an eye an' call the whole thing bob. Try to explain the danger to the culls what live an' work there, an' then ye'd have a frightened, stampedin' mob on yer fambles.

dialogue.name: JACKE
dialogue.text: Nay, lasslad, our only option is to have eyes snilchin' every approach to the tower. I'll put the whid out to as many coves as I can, an' spread 'em through the streets.

dialogue.name: JACKE
dialogue.text: Yer job'll be to cover the Aftcastle. Just wait an' see, Forename─we'll get this Aisibhir...an' his little bomb, too!

dialogue.name: JACKE
dialogue.text: Take up a vantage point at the Aftcastle. One of us'll spot Aisibhir, an' then he'll learn what it means to defy the code!

dialogue.name: BOCHARD
dialogue.text: Ye all right, then, dovecolt? Ye seem set to fly to pieces. But it's times like this that ye most need to calm yer mind, an' keep yer glazes peeled for the small stuff.

dialogue.name: LONWOERD
dialogue.text: （★未使用／削除予定★）

dialogue.name: ITOLWANN
dialogue.text: The Reformists are planning to blow up the command room!? I'll be sure to keep an eye out for any unusual customers here at the Wench. ...Well, more unusual than usual.

dialogue.name: JACKE
dialogue.text: Ugh, the fog picked a grand night to roll in thick. This'll make things interestin'...

dialogue.name: MILALA
dialogue.text: Our presence on the streets is far too thin! Where are the reinforcements I ordered!?

dialogue.name: YELLOWJACKET00155
dialogue.text: My apologies, Captain. There just aren't any more soldiers to spare. The bulk of our forces has already been assigned to guard not only the Admiral, but a number of other high-ranking personnel, as well.

dialogue.name: MILALA
dialogue.text: Unacceptable! What could Commodore Reyner be thinking? There are dangerous criminals stalking the city as we speak!

dialogue.name: MILALA
dialogue.text: Call in squads from the outposts if you must, but I want to see our security tightened and the populace properly protected!

dialogue.name: YELLOWJACKET00155
dialogue.text: But, Captain... We can't be certain the pirates' plan hasn't changed. If we consider the possibility that they've switched to a target outside the walls, it would be folly to weaken those defenses...

dialogue.name: MILALA
dialogue.text: Hmph! You've made your point, Sergeant. Return to your post!

dialogue.name: MILALA
dialogue.text: Once all is lost, it is far too late to question what one should have done...

dialogue.name: MILALA
dialogue.text: You seem troubled, sir. Perhaps I can be of assis─

dialogue.name: MILALA
dialogue.text: Ah!

dialogue.name: AISIBHIRSCREW00155
dialogue.text: (-Smirking Lalafell-)I've been dyin' to meet you, lass. Aye, keen to set eyes on the bold Yellowbelly what cost our crew a fortune in Ul'dahn coin.

dialogue.name: MILALA
dialogue.text: You... You're an Executioner! One of Aisibhir's men!

dialogue.name: AISIBHIRSCREW00155
dialogue.text: Ye've strayed too far into a world ye don't understand, lass. Yer eyes is fixed on the light o' justice, leavin' ye blind to the chasm openin' up at yer feet...

dialogue.name: AISIBHIRSCREW00155
dialogue.text: At least they'll say ye died with yer boots on.

dialogue.name: AISIBHIRSCREW00155
dialogue.text: The Yellowbelly won't be botherin' us no more, Cap'n. As for the mine, the lads'll 'ave it primed in front o' the Wench by the time ye get there.

dialogue.name: AISIBHIR
dialogue.text: Good. Not long now afore we drag that bitch Admiral, her pretty tower, an' all her simperin' curs down to the bottom o' the sea...

dialogue.name: AISIBHIR
dialogue.text: Then I'll raise our flag on the ruins o' the Mizzenmast, an' lead our brethren in a return to the old ways o' blood an' plunder!

dialogue.name: DRUNK00155
dialogue.text: Should not've 'ad that lasht bottle... <hiccup> ...Bottlesh? The wife ish gonna... <hiccup> ...kill me...

dialogue.name: DRUNK00155
dialogue.text: ...Eh? What'sh that, then?

dialogue.name: MILALA
dialogue.text:
...Not after...the command room...
They mean to bring down...the entire...tower...

dialogue.name: MILALA
dialogue.text: If the Mizzenmast falls... <gasp> The bridges...will follow... Half the city will...

dialogue.name: MILALA
dialogue.text:
P-Please... You must help me...
The danger... Far greater than we...

dialogue.name: DRUNK00155
dialogue.text: Bloody hells! It'sh alive! Oh no, no, no, I didn't shee nuffin'! Didn't. Shee. Nuffin'!

dialogue.name: MILALA
dialogue.text: Please! You must...send word...

dialogue.name: MILALA
dialogue.text: Someone...must be told...

dialogue.name: MILALA
dialogue.text: You... How did you...?

dialogue.name: JACKE
dialogue.text: Yer “valiant an' forthright” weapon─ye could hear that single pistol shot from malms away. Weren't hard to guess what'd happened.

dialogue.name: PERIMUHAURIMU
dialogue.text: I poked the Yellowjackets on me way over. A healer'll be along shortly.

dialogue.name: JACKE
dialogue.text: Bene. That means we've only one last thing to do.

dialogue.name: MILALA
dialogue.text: We have never...been allies... But I beg of you...

dialogue.name: MILALA
dialogue.text: You must... You must stop them! ...Save the city!

dialogue.name: JACKE
dialogue.text: Ah, lass, ye know ye don't need to ask. Takin' down mad coves an' bitin' back what was bitten is our job.

dialogue.name: JACKE
dialogue.text: You all set, then?

dialogue.name: VKEBBE
dialogue.text: Ready, Jacke.

dialogue.name: PERIMUHAURIMU
dialogue.text: Always!

dialogue.name: JACKE
dialogue.text: Then let's go cloy that sarcophagus─an' fit Aisibhir for a new coffin!

dialogue.name: MILALA
dialogue.text: Status report?

dialogue.name: YELLOWJACKET00155
dialogue.text: The mine has been disabled, and the engineers should soon have it safely removed.

dialogue.name: YELLOWJACKET00155
dialogue.text: Our soldiers sustained some injuries in the battle with the Reformists, but none were fatal. ...Also, the Admiral sends her sincerest gratitude.

dialogue.name: MILALA
dialogue.text: Hm...

dialogue.name: CITIZENB00155
dialogue.text: Look, there she is! That's Captain Milala! The hero of Limsa Lominsa!

dialogue.name: CITIZENA00155
dialogue.text: Are you recovered from your wound, Captain!?

dialogue.name: CITIZENB00155
dialogue.text: We heard how you very nearly lost your life stopping that horde of pirates from blowing up the Mizzenmast!

dialogue.name: CITIZENC00155
dialogue.text: Three cheers for the Yellowjackets! Our city'd be lost without ye!

dialogue.name: MILALA
dialogue.text: But, wait... That's not how it...

dialogue.name: MILALA
dialogue.text: Sergeant! What of the rogues? Did they survive the battle?

dialogue.name: YELLOWJACKET00155
dialogue.text: I don't rightly know, Captain... All we found near the sarcophagus were Reformists─either dead or strung from the rafters.

dialogue.name: MILALA
dialogue.text: ...Alive, then. 'Twould seem we are deeply in their debt.

dialogue.name: YELLOWJACKET00155
dialogue.text: ...Ah, Captain? Might I have the Silver Sorrows from you now? We've been ordered to hand them over to the commodore, along with the Black Sarcophagus.

dialogue.name: MILALA
dialogue.text: Why, of course, they're right h─

dialogue.name: MILALA
dialogue.text: ...The earrings! I could've sworn I was still...

dialogue.name: MILALA
dialogue.text: <gasp> ...He wouldn't have! He stole them from me while I lay dying!?

dialogue.name: MILALA
dialogue.text: That...that cad! I knew he was not to be trusted!

dialogue.name: MILALA
dialogue.text: “Keep an eye on them,” indeed. I should have known...

dialogue.name: PERIMUHAURIMU
dialogue.text: Are ye sure about this, Jacke? We should've cloyed the sarcophagus as well.

dialogue.name: JACKE
dialogue.text: （★未使用／削除予定★）

dialogue.name: JACKE
dialogue.text: ...Eh, I think she's earned it, don't you? If it bothers ye that much, think of it as a trade.

dialogue.name: PERIMUHAURIMU
dialogue.text: （★未使用／削除予定★）

dialogue.name: VKEBBE
dialogue.text: <giggle> If ye ask me, they look a bit daft.

dialogue.name: JACKE
dialogue.text: Well, I didn't ask ye!

dialogue.name: JACKE
dialogue.text: So, the 'Jackets ended up with the mine, an' we got the diamond an' the earrings. Which means... Victory belongs to the Rogues' Guild!

dialogue.name: PERIMUHAURIMU
dialogue.text: Do ye think Milala'll leave it at that, then? I get the feelin' we ain't done with her yet.

dialogue.name: JACKE
dialogue.text: I'd say we're done with her challenge, but ye never know when our paths'll cross again. We'll just have to see what Limsa's underbelly spits up next.

dialogue.name: PERIMUHAURIMU
dialogue.text: Aye. This city ain't ever quiet for long...

dialogue.name: PERIMUHAURIMU
dialogue.text: Well, it's been a pleasure workin' with ye, Forename! If I ever need a trusty pair o' stabbers by me side, I'll know who to ask!

dialogue.name: VKEBBE
dialogue.text: I'm off as well. Bloody starvin', I am... Don't forget to yaffle a bite when ye can, eh, Forename?

dialogue.name: JACKE
dialogue.text: We'd best head back to the Sisters, too, afore the shrew decides she'd rather hear us cry cockles.

dialogue.name: JACKE
dialogue.text: Bene work, Forename. Be seein' ye soon.

dialogue.name: JACKE
dialogue.text: Ho there, Forename. It'll be nice to finally have a bit of a rest, eh? The job never ends, but even a dimber damber like meself needs to breathe every now an' again.

dialogue.name: JACKE
dialogue.text: An' yer 'venturin' mates must be wonderin' where ye've got to! That was a proper long assignment, but I'm glad ye decided to see it through.

dialogue.name: JACKE
dialogue.text: Ye've proven to be a stalwart protector o' the code...even if this ain't truly yer world. When ye walk back into the lightmans, ye'll have to find yer own code to uphold.

dialogue.name: JACKE
dialogue.text: An' when ye do, ye'll have the skills ye learned in the shadows to help ye defend it.

dialogue.name: JACKE
dialogue.text: Well, that's more'n enough prittle prattle out o' me. Yer travels might take ye far an' wide, Forename, but know yer always welcome here at the Sisters!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Defeat the Reformists, and prevent the explosion!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Destroy detonators

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Find and destroy the detonators before time runs out!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Defeat the Reformists!

dialogue.name: JACKE
dialogue.text: Make for the Mizzenmast an' find Aisibhir!

dialogue.name: JACKE
dialogue.text:
Forename, mill all them detonators!
We'll keep these coves busy!

dialogue.name: JACKE
dialogue.text: The bomb! We're too late...

dialogue.name: JACKE
dialogue.text:
That's the bomb taken care of, then.
Now these bastards get our full attention!

dialogue.name: JACKE
dialogue.text: The job... We was almost done...

dialogue.name: JACKE
dialogue.text:
Bene!
Ye know how I hate trackin' down stragglers!

dialogue.name: PERIMU
dialogue.text:
So many of 'em...
I think their whole bloody crew is here!

dialogue.name: PERIMU
dialogue.text:
Find an' smash them detonators!
Check the ramps goin' up, an' goin' down!

dialogue.name: PERIMU
dialogue.text: The light on the mine went out!

dialogue.name: PERIMU
dialogue.text: Try not to trip...over me quarron...

dialogue.name: VKEBBE
dialogue.text: What!? That's it, then!?

dialogue.name: VKEBBE
dialogue.text: Forename's disabled the sarcophagus!

dialogue.name: VKEBBE
dialogue.text: I guess I have...gotten soft...

dialogue.name: BOSS
dialogue.text:
Ye can't stop us now, scrags!
Only three minutes until the show begins!

dialogue.name: BOSS
dialogue.text:
Damn you rogues an' yer swivin' code!
I'll have yer bloody 'eads for this!

dialogue.name: BOSS
dialogue.text:
This wasn't...part o' me plan...
I could've been a king among pirates...

obj.n: Peasants by Day, Ninjas by Night
